Get mt_filt based on automatic removal of quantiles
```{r}
all_seu_prelim_stg_norm <- all_seu_prelim_stg_norm%>% 
  map(., ~{
    
    mit_fts <- rownames(.x)[str_detect(rownames(.x), "MIT")]
    api_fts <- rownames(.x)[str_detect(rownames(.x), "API")]
    
    .x %>% PercentageFeatureSet(., features = mit_fts, col.name = 'percent.mt') %>%
    PercentageFeatureSet(., features = api_fts, col.name = 'percent.api') 
})

```

```{r}
mt_filt <- unlist(map(all_seu_prelim_stg_norm, ~quantile(.x@meta.data[, "percent.mt"], 0.995, na.rm = T)))
# mt_filt <- unlist(map(all_seu_prelim_stg_norm, ~quantile(.x@meta.data[, "percent.mt"], 0.99, na.rm = T)))

```

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=28, fig.height=4}
## in cellbender but not in edrops
fn_stg_barp_tbl <- imap(all_seu_prelim_stg_norm, ~.x@meta.data %>% 
       count(nFeature_RNA <100 , sR_fine_stg) %>%
       rename("gn_less100" = `nFeature_RNA < 100`) %>%
       mutate(across(gn_less100, ~str_extract(., "^."))) %>%
       group_by(gn_less100) %>%
       mutate(prop_n = round(n/sum(n), 2))
     ) %>%
  bind_rows(., .id = "donor") %>%
  filter(str_detect(donor, "cbendr")) %>%
  ungroup() 

n_per_facet <- fn_stg_barp_tbl %>% count(donor, gn_less100) %>% pull(n) %>% max()
```
